itunes:title: Impressionist Does Every Cartoon Character Possible (Vincent Marcus)
title: Impressionist Does Every Cartoon Character Possible (Vincent Marcus)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary: Our friend Vincent Marcus comes showing off incredible voice impressions of Stuey Griffon, Homer Simpson, and every other character under the sun. He shares his experience on America's Got Talent as he got to the semi-finals and provides beats for Ilya to rap on. Follow him at @vincentmarcus Follow us on instagram @LIGHTWEIGHTSPOD to enter the FREE giveaway as every week we give away $$$ to the audience! --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/lightweights/support Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
